summary: A new collection of Armors for female adventurers
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/19717-1-1341150030.jpg[/img]
Here is my newest Collection for you guys; The Steel Maiden Armor Set.
There are a total of 6 available and a pair of boots and some gloves.
There are 3 colors and 2 variants.
The armors are only Available by crafting them or by console manipulation if you like(not sure of the codes)
All you need to craft it is some steel ingots, leather and leather straps

The Armor is Based off of the CBBE body. there might be issues but nothing too bad for non CBBE users

Any Feedback or suggestions are appreciated
Bug reports are also welcome

All modeling and texturing was made by me. with some inspirations from the Claymore series.
